benefits.badgeDescription: Show a small Premium badge on your profile and messages.
benefits.dealbreakersDescription: Use hard filters in Discover to only see matches that fit your must-haves.
benefits.introsDescription: Send a first message even before you match (where allowed).
benefits.unlimitedLikesDescription: Like as many profiles as you want every day.
benefits.unlimitedRewindsDescription: Go back to the previous profile if you swiped too fast.
benefits.weeklySuperLikesDescription: Highlight yourself with Super Likes each week.
benefits.weeklySuperLikesDescriptionWithCount: You currently get {{count}} Super Likes per week.
benefits.whoLikedMeDescription: Open the Likes overview to see who already liked you.

hub.title: Premium Hub
hub.currentPlanDescription: This page shows your current Premium status and the benefits that are active on your account.
hub.activeHint: Premium is active. Most benefits below should already be unlocked.
hub.freeHint: You are currently on the Free plan. Upgrade to unlock all Premium benefits.
hub.syncHint: If something looks out of date, open Subscription Settings and press Sync. It will pull the latest entitlements from billing.
hub.benefitsDescription: Here is a quick overview of what Premium offers. Active benefits are highlighted, locked ones are shown in gray.
hub.note: Some benefits may depend on local laws or safety rules. We may roll out new Premium features over time.

unlimitedLikes.title: Unlimited Likes
unlimitedLikes.description: Like as many profiles as you want every day.

unlimitedRewinds.title: Unlimited Rewinds
unlimitedRewinds.description: Go back to the previous profile if you swiped too fast.

whoLikedMe.title: See who liked you
whoLikedMe.description: Open the Likes overview to see who already liked you.

superLikesPerWeek.title: Weekly Super Likes
superLikesPerWeek.descriptionWithCount: You currently get {{count}} Super Likes per week.
superLikesPerWeek.description: Highlight yourself with Super Likes each week.

intros.title: Intro messages
intros.description: Send a first message even before you match (where allowed).

dealbreakers.title: Dealbreaker filters
dealbreakers.description: Use hard filters in Discover to only see matches that fit your must-haves.

badge.title: Premium badge
badge.description: Show a small Premium badge on your profile and messages.

upgradeSignInRequiredBody: To view Premium benefits and upgrade your account, please sign in.
upgradeFooterNote: You’ll be redirected to your subscription settings. Payment is handled by your configured provider (e.g., Stripe).
